scripts.start:firefox: cp manifest-template.json manifest.json && node update_manifest.mjs firefox manifest.json && web-ext run --target firefox-desktop --source-dir ./
scripts.start:chrome: cp  manifest-template.json manifest.json && node update_manifest.mjs chrome  manifest.json && web-ext run --target chromium        --source-dir ./
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.lint:js: eslint . ; npm run build:firefox && web-ext lint --source-dir ./dist/firefox
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
